function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of guppies around households","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement water treatment and hygiene education programs","Technologies":"Water filtration systems, water purification tablets","People":"Household residents","Owner":"Local health authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges of maintaining guppy distribution system","Impact":"Increased risk of Aedes larvae infestation","Mitigation":"Sustained government investment and support, capacity building, and oversight","Technologies":"Guppy breeding and distribution techniques","People":"Local residents, grassroots NGOs","Owner":"Government authorities"},{"Description":"High malaria transmission related to vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased malaria transmission","Mitigation":"Integrate malaria and food security programs, provide access to healthcare","Technologies":"Healthcare facilities, malaria prevention tools","People":"Vulnerable populations in Africa","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government authorities"}]}
